summary: Two teenage yoga enthusiasts must do battle with an evil presence that is threatening to rise from its underground lair and endanger their major party plans.
cast: Lily-Rose Depp|Harley Quinn Smith|Adam Brody|Harley Morenstein|Ashley Greene|Jack Depp|Austin Butler|Tyler Posey|Jennifer Schwalbach Smith|Justin Long|Tony Hale|Natasha Lyonne|Genesis Rodriguez|Vanessa Paradis|Haley Joel Osment|Ralph Garman|Sasheer Zamata|Johnny Depp|Kevin Conroy|Kevin Smith|Stan Lee|Jason Mewes|Charles Sauveur Bonan|David Greathouse|Robert Kurtzman|Christopher Drake|Joel Shock
title: Yoga Hosers
